name: One Chance (itch) (elugames)
description:
This Game was a group Project at SAE Institute Zurich. Yannick Spadin had the idea and took the lead in the project, doing all the story elements and game/leveldesign.
Jeffrey Bhamornsiri was programming character movement  and traps.
My part was UI and Sound programming.

One Chance is a Story-Driven, Side-Scrolling Survival Plattformer. Avoid traps, solve puzzles and at the end of each level, answer the question: Why are you here? What happened? Make one mistake and everything is over.

Controls:

Move: A, D, S

Space: Jump

Interact: F

Text only in german.
